message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $150 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125?
I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $130. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $125 again?
